data.title: Prisoner Maria: The Movie (1995)
data.meta_description: Convicted of killing the drug dealer who murdered her husband, Maria is blackmailed into serving as a covert assassin. She must do the government's bidding if she is ever to regain her freedom, or her son. With each completed mission, her sentenced is further re- duced. Yet, with every job she feels further away from her goal of a peaceful life.
data.text: Prisoner Maria: The Movie is the movie version of Prisoner Maria, which was (according to the credits) a manga. Made in 1995 I suppose the idea of deciding between adapting a manga to an anime or a live action movie were 50% and this one they decided to go with live action. The film follows a woman named Maria. She's a prisoner serving a life sentence in prison. However, she's got a deal with he person who runs the prison to be let out to assassinate certain targets in exchange they will knock off some years of her life sentence and also promises to let her see her son. It's an interesting concept for a movie, almost like a Nikitaâ€¦
